EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Thank you for joining our extreme retail convenience panel. In case you missed any part of the engaging 30-minute discussion moderated by Clifford Gumkowski – VP Americas for NCR Retail sales, featuring: - Neil Stern (CEO, The Good Food Holdings) - Amanda Lai (Food and Retail Practice Lead, McMillanDoolittle) and - Kalyna Stiles (Global Senior Director of Store Transformation, NCR) You can watch the replay <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/self-checkout-product-family/panel-webinar-replay?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3a&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> below! <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/self-checkout-product-family/panel-webinar-replay?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3a&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> Ready to discuss how you can transform your store to deliver the extreme convenience shoppers are looking for?
